subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|i}} – a spring {{zh-l|*泉}} bursting from a cliff-side {{zh-l|*厂}}: origin.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: The sense “source, origin; basic, primary” is perhaps related to {{och-l|元|head; principal; first; great}} ({{zh-ref|Qiu, 1988}}).

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[meadow]]; [[field]]; [[plain]]; [[prairie]]; [[tundra]]; [[wilderness]]
# [[source]]; [[origin]]; [[beginning]]
# {{zh-original|源|fountainhead; source}}
# [[basic]]; [[fundamental]]
# [[original]]; [[primary]]
# [[originally]]; at the [[beginning]]
# to [[originate]]; to [[arise]]
# to [[trace]] the [[source]]; to [[probe]] into
# to [[forgive]]; to [[pardon]]
# {{surname|lang=zh}}

subSections.text:

|goon=ごん
|kanon=げん<げん<ぐゑん
|kanyoon=がん<ぐわん
|kun=はら-
|nanori=た, ばる, ら, わた, わら

subSections.title: Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|はら}}

From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=はら|-}}. Found in the ''{{w|Man'yōshū}}'', finished some time after 759 CE. Compare Korean {{ko-inline|벌|peol|plain, field}}.

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: Specifically refers to a field that is not [[cultivate]]d.

subSections.title: Prefix
